tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE compost_activities (
  activity_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  bin_id INT NOT NULL,
  material_id INT NOT NULL,
  activity_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  quantity_used DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (bin_id) REFERENCES compost_bins(bin_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES compost_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CompostingLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  bin_id INT,
  quantity_added DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);
